tasks.task: Rehabilitating farmers after flash floods using organic farming in Balochistan
subtasks: Monitoring crop progress (e.g., rice, lentils, vegetables) harvested in Kharif season
Planting wheat as the final crop with NGO and Rotary International support
Addressing challenges in land access and traditional farming methods
Discussing four wheat sowing methods used in the region
Expressing gratitude to IDSP Pakistan, NGOs, and community members for rehabilitation efforts

tasks.task: Continuing harvest and planting activities for rehabilitation
subtasks: Gathering and monitoring Kharif season crops (rice, lentils, vegetables)
Planting wheat with NGO support
Continue planting wheat
Harvest current crops
Express gratitude to supporters (could be written as part of expressing appreciation). But again, that's ambiguous.

tasks.task: Rehabilitation farming: harvesting Kharif crops and planting wheat
subtasks: Harvesting rice, lentils, and vegetables (removing them from the fields)
Sorting and storing harvested crops
Planting wheat using sowing methods provided by NGO (work with the tractor, water channels, etc.)
